ref: 12082 vr̥ścikapattrikā f. ʻ the plant Basella cordifolia ʼ lex., vr̥ścipattrī -- f. ʻ Tragia involucrata ʼ lex. [vŕ̊ścika -- , páttra -- ]
B. bic(h)uṭi, bichā̆ṭi, bichāti ʻ the nettle Tragia involucrata ʼ;
Or. bichuāti ʻ stinging nettle, T. involucrata, Fleurya interrupta, Laportia cremulata ʼ;
H. bichātā m., bichuṭī f., bichuā m. ʻ the nettle Urtica interrupta. ʼ
